properties.address: North Yorkshire County Council, North Yorkshire YO17 7LJ
properties.description: Malton Library & Information Centre offers a large selection of books, audiobooks, maps, and DVDs that members can borrow. The Library has a coffee machine and space to read the newspapers, find out about community events and activities and read the daily newspapers. We have free WiFi as well as access to computers which are free for 1hr per day. We run regular activities such as a Stay and Play session for under 5s every Monday at 10.30, and a Storytime every Tuesday at 1030. We also have a Lego Club for families on Wednesdays 13.00-15.00 and Saturdays 10.00-12.00. For the adults we have a craft club on Tuesday evenings from 17.00-19.00 and a board game club on Fridays from 14.00-16.00. All these activities are free and do not require booking. To find out more about library events and activities please check our Facebook page. There are two disabled car parking spaces at the front of the library. Free parking for up to two hours is available in the marketplace, a five-minute walk away, and long and short-stay car parks are about ten minutes' walk away. The library has automatic doors and is accessible to wheelchairs.
properties.title: Malton Library

properties.description: Open to all for a meal, conversation and company This space on a Monday provides a two course meal (£5 per person) which is followed by our CAMEO (Come And Meet Each Other) club for £1 pp. This club is interactive with activities such as craft, games, films etc each week where refreshments are served.
properties.title: Malton Salvation Army

properties.address: 86 Commercial Street, Norton, Malton, North Yorkshire YO17 9ES
properties.description: Norton Hive offers a large selection of books and audiobooks that members can borrow. The Library has space to read the local newspaper and find out about community events and activities. We have free WiFi as well as access to computers which are free for 1hr per day. We run regular activities for children such as Harminis music class every Wednesday afternoon at 1.30pm and a Storytime every Thursday morning at 10.30am. For the adults we have Knit and Natter on Thursday mornings from 10.30-12.00 and a monthly wool spinning group on the last Tuesday of the month. To find out more about library events and activities please check our Facebook page.
properties.title: Norton Hive Community Library and Hub
